name: Cox's Bazar
loc_des: Cox's Bazar offers a variety of accommodations by the longest sea beach. Enjoy stunning ocean views and modern amenities in this coastal paradise.

rooms.title: Light bright airy stylish apt & safe peaceful stay
rooms.description: Experience paradise by staying in this beachfront apartment. Perfect for a relaxing getaway, featuring stunning ocean views. 2 bedrooms, 2 beds, 2 baths. WiFi, air conditioning, and kitchen facilities available.

rooms.title: Apartment in Lost Panorama
rooms.description: Enjoy the serenity of the seaside in this cozy retreat. Ideal for a peaceful stay with family or friends. 1 bedroom, 1 bed, 1 bath. WiFi and kitchenette available.

rooms.title: AR Lounge & Pool (r&r + b&b)
rooms.description: Indulge in luxury with this stunning villa featuring a private pool and breathtaking ocean views. 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, spacious living areas. WiFi, air conditioning, and fully-equipped kitchen provided.

name: Sundarbans
loc_des: Discover the Sundarbans' wild expanse with snug cabins and riverside lodges. Immerse in nature's tranquility amid verdant foliage and serene riverbanks, promising an enriching escape into the heart of wilderness.

rooms.title: Light bright airy stylish apt & safe peaceful stay
rooms.description: Escape to the heart of the jungle with this cozy cabin retreat. Experience nature at its finest. 1 bedroom, 1 bed, 1 bath. Basic amenities provided.

rooms.title: Riverfront Lodge
rooms.description: Stay close to nature with this charming riverfront lodge. Spectacular views and peaceful surroundings. 2 bedrooms, 2 beds, 1 bath. WiFi and basic amenities provided.

rooms.title: Wilderness Retreat House
rooms.description: Experience the wilderness with this rustic retreat house. Perfect for adventurers seeking an authentic jungle experience. 3 bedrooms, 2 baths. Basic amenities provided.

name: Bandarban
loc_des: Bandarban beckons with its scenic grandeur and rugged terrain, inviting adventurers to mountain chalets and riverside retreats. Embrace panoramic vistas and tranquil landscapes for an unparalleled mountain getaway.

rooms.title: Mountain View Chalet
rooms.description: Wake up to breathtaking mountain views in this charming chalet. Ideal for nature lovers and adventurers. 2 bedrooms, 2 beds, 1 bath. WiFi and basic amenities provided.

rooms.title: Riverside Cottage
rooms.description: Relax by the river in this cozy riverside cottage. Serene atmosphere and beautiful surroundings. 1 bedroom, 1 bed, 1 bath. WiFi and basic amenities provided.

rooms.title: Hilltop Retreat
rooms.description: Escape to the hills with this secluded hilltop retreat. Spectacular views and tranquil surroundings. 3 bedrooms, 3 beds, 2 baths. WiFi and basic amenities provided.
